<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	The letting terms
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	In
	consideration of the rents reserved and the covenants on the part of the Tenant the Landlord demises the Premises with full title
	guarantee to the Tenant together with the rights specified in Schedule 1&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Rights granted to the Tenant
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;)
	excepting and reserving the rights specified in Schedule 2&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Rights reserved to the Landlord
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;)
	but subject to and where appropriate with the benefit of all matters contained or referred to in Schedule 3&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Matters
	to which the Lease is subject
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;) for the Term yielding and paying
	by way of rent yearly and proportionately for any less time than a year:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Principal Rent payable by equal quarterly payments in advance on the usual quarter days in
	each year with the first payment being a due proportion in respect of the period from Rent Commencement Date until the day before
	the next following quarter day (both dates inclusive) to be made on Rent Commencement Date;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Insurance Rent payable within 20 Working Days of written demand but not in any event sooner
	than one month prior to the commencement of the renewal date of such insurance;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	the Sixth Floor Service Charge payable
	at the times and in the manner specified in Schedule 4&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	The Sixth Floor Service
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
<I>
	Charge
</I>
	);
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Building Service Charge payable quarterly in advance on the usual quarter days, and a fair
	and reasonable proportion of any shortfall calculated pursuant to the terms of the Superior Lease to be paid within 20 Working
	Days of written demand with any overpayments to be allowed against the next instalment of the Building Service Charge or after
	the Termination of the Term to be repaid to the Tenant within twenty (20) Working Days of ascertainment;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Block Service Charge payable within 20 Working Days of written demand;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

	the Estate Service Charge payable within 20 Working Days of written demand;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

	(g)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	all costs reasonably and properly incurred by the Superior Landlord and payable by the Landlord
	under the Superior Lease for the Superior Landlord providing hot and cold water supplies to the Premises (as measured by the sub-meters
	installed at the Premises) within 20 Working Days of written demand;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(h)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any other sums falling due under this Lease; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	VAT on the rents reserved by this Lease payable at the time such rents are payable.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	Tenant&rsquo;s covenants
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The
	Tenant covenants with the Landlord as set out in this Clause&nbsp;3&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Tenant&rsquo;s covenants
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;).

<A NAME="eolPage146"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Pay rents
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To pay the rents reserved by
	this Lease on the days and in the manner specified without (subject to any contrary statutory requirement) any deduction or set
	off (whether legal or equitable) such payment if required by the Landlord to be made by banker&rsquo;s standing order or credit
	transfer to such bank and account as the Landlord shall from time to time nominate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Outgoings
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.2.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To pay or indemnify the Landlord against all existing and future rates, (including rates for unoccupied
	property), taxes, impositions, outgoings and assessments whatsoever (including all charges for gas and electricity consumed on
	the Premises) which shall during the Term be assessed or imposed on or in respect of the Premises whether assessed or imposed on
	the Landlord or the Tenant (except tax (other than VAT) payable by the Landlord in respect of rents payable under this Lease or
	tax payable as a result of any dealing with any reversion immediately or mediately expectant on the Term) all such sums to be paid
	within 20 Working Days of written demand for them or in accordance with the terms of the various service providers if such terms
	provide for a shorter payment period and only insofar as such sums are not recovered by the Landlord through any service charge.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.2.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If any such outgoing is assessed on the Building and paid by the Landlord, to repay the Landlord
	on demand such proportion as the Landlord&rsquo;s Surveyor reasonably determines to be fairly attributable to the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.2.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To pay that part of the Landlord&rsquo;s Energy Management Costs which the Landlord or the Landlord&rsquo;s
	Surveyor reasonably attributes to the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Costs of consent
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To pay within 20 Working Days
	of written demand the Landlord&rsquo;s and the Superior Landlord&rsquo;s reasonable fees and expenses (including any stamp duty
	on licences and duplicates) properly incurred resulting from all applications by the Tenant for any consent required by this Lease
	including cases where the application is withdrawn or consent is refused save where such consent is proffered subject to an unreasonable
	or unlawful condition or where a court determines such consent is unreasonably refused or withdrawn in circumstances where the
	Landlord and/or the Superior Landlord as applicable is required to act reasonably.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Landlord&rsquo;s expenses
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To pay to the Landlord and
	the Superior Landlord within 10 Working Days of written demand all proper costs, charges and expenses (including legal costs, bailiffs&rsquo;
	fees and fees payable to a surveyor or an architect):
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	resulting from any breach by the Tenant of any of its obligations under this Lease (including without
	prejudice to the generality of the foregoing) the recovery of arrears of rent;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	incidental to any contemplated or actual notice or proceedings preparatory to forfeiture of this
	Lease for breach of its terms notwithstanding forfeiture is avoided otherwise than by relief granted by the court;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	resulting from the Landlord and/or the Superior Landlord and/or the Head Landlord abating a nuisance
	caused by the Tenant on the Premises and executing all such works as may be necessary for abating a nuisance caused by the Tenant
	on the Premises in obedience to a notice served by any local or other authority; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	incidental to the preparation and service of all notices and schedules relating to wants of repair
	to the Premises and whether served during the Term or within four months after the Termination of the Term (but relating in all
	cases to such wants of repair that accrued not later than Termination of the Term).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	VAT
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.5.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To pay in addition to (and at the same time as) the rents or other sums payable under this Lease
	any VAT which may from time to time be applicable to them and where the Tenant is obliged to pay an amount of money such amount
	shall be regarded as being exclusive of all VAT which may be payable on it and the Landlord agrees to provide a VAT invoice as
	soon as reasonably practicable following receipt of the same.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.5.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In every case where the Tenant has agreed to reimburse the Landlord and/or the Superior Landlord
	in respect of any payment made by the Landlord and/or the Superior Landlord under the terms of this Lease the Tenant shall also
	at the same time reimburse any VAT paid by the Landlord and/or the Superior Landlord on such payment (except to the extent that
	such VAT is recoverable by the Landlord and/or the Superior Landlord and/or Head Landlord as a deductible input) and the Landlord
	shall, where the payment is made to the Landlord, issue a VAT invoice as soon as reasonably practicable following receipt of the
	same.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Interest on late payment
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If any sum payable by the Tenant
	under this Lease shall be due but unpaid for 15 Working Days (in the case of the Principal Rent only whether formally demanded
	or not) to pay to the Landlord interest at the Prescribed Rate from time to time (after as well as before any judgment of the courts)
	on such unpaid sum from the due date until the date of payment in full provided that this Clause shall not prejudice any other
	right or remedy of the Landlord in respect of such unpaid sum.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.7
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Repair
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.7.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To keep the Premises in good and substantial repair and condition and properly cleansed excluding
	damage by:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any Insured Risk except and to the extent that the insurance monies are irrecoverable due to any
	act or default of the Tenant or any person deriving title under the Tenant or any of their respective agents, employees or licensees
	or contractors; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	an Uninsured Risk but only insofar as damage caused by an Uninsured Risk makes the Premises or
	a substantial part of them unfit for occupation or use and only to the extent that the Uninsured Risk shall not have become an
	Uninsured Risk by any act or default of the Tenant or any person deriving title under the Tenant or any of their respective agents,
	employees, licensees or contractors,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	PROVIDED
	THAT the Tenant shall not be required to put or keep the Premises in any better state of repair and condition than as at the date
	of this lease as evidenced by the Schedule of Condition.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.7.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To notify the Landlord in writing as soon as practicable of any material defect or material lack
	of repair in the Premises of which the Tenant becomes aware.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.8
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Decoration
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	To
	paint with two coats of good quality paint all the wood, metal and other parts normally painted of the interior of the Premises
	in the fifth year of the Term and in the last year of the Term (however determined, but not more than once in any two year period)
	and after painting to decorate, grain, varnish, wash or suitably treat all such parts as have previously been so dealt with and
	to repaper the parts usually papered with suitable paper of a good quality provided that any change of colour or design shall be
	previously approved in writing by the Landlord (such approval not to be unreasonably withheld) PROVIDED THAT the Tenant shall not
	be required to put the Premises in any better decorative state than as at the date of this lease as evidenced by the Schedule of
	Condition
</FONT>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.9
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Landlord&rsquo;s entry and rights
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.9.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To permit the Landlord or its agents and/or the Superior Landlord and/or the Head Landlord with
	or without workmen and others at all reasonable times during the Term at convenient hours in the daytime and (except in the case
	of emergency when no notice need be given) upon the giving of as much written notice as reasonably practicable, but in any event
	not to be less than 24 hours, to enter into and on the Premises for the purpose of:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	viewing the Premises to ensure that nothing has been done that constitutes a breach of any of the
	covenants in this Lease;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	viewing and examining the state and condition of the Premises and carrying out environmental surveys;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	complying with any of its obligations; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	exercising the rights excepted and reserved
	in Schedule 2&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Rights reserved to the Landlord
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;)
	or elsewhere in this Lease, the Superior Lease or the Headlease,
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	subject in all cases to the
	person exercising such rights doing so accompanied by a representative of the Tenant (except in case of emergency or where the
	Tenant fails to provide such a representative after reasonable prior notice from the Landlord) and making good all damage caused
	in the exercise of such rights as soon as reasonably practicable and to the Tenant&rsquo;s reasonable satisfaction.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.9.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord may give the Tenant notice in writing specifying any wants of repair which are the
	Tenant&rsquo;s responsibility and/or any other breaches of covenant and requiring the Tenant to remedy the same, and the Tenant
	shall start to comply with such notice within two calendar months of receipt of the notice and thereafter diligently proceed with
	such works (or immediately in an emergency).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.9.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the Tenant fails to discharge its obligations under this Clause it shall be lawful for the Landlord,
	its agents, servants and workmen and/or the Superior Landlord and/or the Head Landlord at any time to enter upon the Premises for
	the purposes of stopping and remedying breaches of covenant and of executing such repairs as may be required to achieve compliance
	with the Tenant&rsquo;s covenants in this Lease and the proper cost and expense so incurred together with any surveyor&rsquo;s
	or other charges or fees incurred in connection with them shall be paid by the Tenant within 5 Working Days of written demand.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.10
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Cleaning windows and doors
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To clean the inside of all
	windows (including the inside of the external windows that are excluded from the Premises)
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: #106190">
</FONT>
	at
	least once in every month.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 16; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.11
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Not to obstruct Conduits
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to do anything whereby
	any of the Conduits may become choked, obstructed or damaged or whereby the working of any Conduit may be impaired or adversely
	affected.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.12
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Waste
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to commit any waste whether
	permissive or voluntary in or upon the Premises.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.13
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Floor loading
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to endanger any floor of
	the Building or any of the gas, electricity, water and other services at any time provided for use in the Building by overloading
	them nor to use any part of the Premises or the Conduits in such a manner as to exceed the capacity of them or subject them to
	any strain beyond that which they are designed to bear or so as to cause noise or vibration in or to any adjoining or neighbouring
	premises or land.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.14
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Alterations
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.14.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to make any alterations or additions to the Premises of a structural or external nature or
	that may permanently damage or alter the appearance of the exposed concrete soffit.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.14.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not without the prior written consent of the Landlord (such consent not to be unreasonably withheld)
	to make any alteration or addition to any of the Conduits or the systems for the supply of heating, air conditioning (if any),
	lighting, electric power or water installed within or upon the Premises provided that the Landlord shall not be considered to be
	acting unreasonably if such alterations adversely affect the Service Systems.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.14.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Without prejudice to Clause&nbsp;3.14.1 and &lrm;Clause&nbsp;3.14.2 not without the prior written
	consent of the Landlord (such consent not to be unreasonably withheld) to make any other alteration or addition to the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.14.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If alterations or additions are made to notify the Landlord in writing immediately following completion
	of the works for insurance purposes.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.14.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Subject to Clause&nbsp;3.14.1 and Clause&nbsp;3.14.2 and notwithstanding &lrm;Clause&nbsp;3.14.3
	and Clause&nbsp;3.14.4 the Tenant may install alter and/or remove internal demountable partitioning (together with all necessary
	fastenings and/or cabling provided that such fastenings and/or cabling do not materially adversely affect the structure of the
	Building or the partitioning dividing the Premises from the remainder of the Landlord&rsquo;s Premises) without the Landlord&rsquo;s
	consent, provided that:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Tenant shall first supply the Landlord with full details and plans of such partitioning or
	its removal;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any partitioning installed in the Premises does not affect the appearance of the external window
	lines of the Building;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any partitioning adjacent to the external elevation of the Building dovetails with the window mullions;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	such installation or removal does not adversely affect any of the Conduits; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 17; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	13
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</TD>

<A NAME="eolPage150"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any damage caused to the structure of the Building or to the partitioning dividing the Premises
	from the remainder of the Landlord&rsquo;s Premises is made good to the Landlord&rsquo;s reasonable satisfaction immediately by
	the Tenant at its own cost.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.14.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to make any alterations or additions to the Premises which, in the Landlord&rsquo;s reasonable
	opinion, have a material adverse effect on the energy efficiency, Operational Rating or Asset Rating of the Premises or the Building.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.14.7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	All alterations must be carried out in accordance with the Lessee&rsquo;s Fit Out Guide.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.15
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Yield up
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	At the Termination of the Term
	to yield up the Premises to the Landlord in such repair and decorative condition as shall accord with full compliance by the Tenant
	with the Tenant&rsquo;s covenants in this Lease having:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	removed from the Premises all tenant&rsquo;s fixtures, fittings and other property belonging to
	the Tenant or any third party;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(if and to the extent reasonably required by the Landlord by notice not less than three months
	before the end of the Term) removed all alterations or additions made during the Term (except for any floor boxes installed by
	the Tenant with consent) and reinstated the Premises to their prior state and condition of full open plan accommodation;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	made good to the reasonable satisfaction of the Landlord any damage to the Premises caused by such
	removal and reinstatement; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	redecorated the Premises having first obtained the Landlord&rsquo;s approval (such approval not
	to be unreasonably withheld) of the colours to be used for such redecoration provided that the Tenant shall not be required to
	replace any carpets at the Premises at the Termination of the Term.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.16
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Restrictions on use
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Not to use
	the Premises or any part of them for any sale by auction or for any illegal, immoral or improper purpose.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.17
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Permitted user
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to convert or use the Premises
	or any part of them for any purpose whatsoever other than for the Permitted Use.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.18
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Alienation
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.18.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Save as permitted by the following provisions of this Lease not to assign, underlet mortgage, charge
	or part with the possession or share the occupation of the whole or any part of the Premises nor permit any person deriving title
	from the Tenant to do so and, notwithstanding the provisions of this Clause&nbsp;3.18&nbsp;(
<I>
	Alienation
</I>
	), not to grant a
	licence or to assign this Lease to any of the Specified Companies until the earlier of:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	the date five years from and including 22 January 2016 ; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	17 January 2023.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.18.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No Underletting
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">

<A NAME="eolPage151"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to underlet the whole or
	any part of the Premises
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.18.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Assignment
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to assign the whole of
	the Premises without the prior written consent of the Landlord (such consent not to be unreasonably withheld) Provided That (for
	the purposes of section 19(1A) of the Landlord and Tenant Act 1927) the Landlord shall be entitled to impose all or any of the
	matters set out in Clause&nbsp;3.18.5 as a condition of its consent.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.18.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	General saving
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The proviso to Clause&nbsp;3.18.3
	shall operate without prejudice to the right of the Landlord to withhold such consent on any other grounds where such withholding
	of consent would be reasonable or to impose any further conditions upon the grant of consent where the imposition of such conditions
	would be reasonable.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.18.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Specific conditions which the Landlord may impose
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The conditions referred to
	in Clause&nbsp;3.18.3 (and which are to be fulfilled prior to completion of the proposed assignment) are as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the delivery to the Landlord of a deed (being an authorised guarantee agreement within section
	16 of the Landlord and Tenant (Covenants) Act 1995 entered into by the Tenant in the form set out in Schedule 7&nbsp; (Authorised
	Guarantee Agreement)) or in such other form as the Landlord may from time to time reasonably determine;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the payment to the Landlord of all rents and other sums which have fallen due under the Lease prior
	to the date of the proposed assignment;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the giving of any requisite consent of any Superior Landlord or mortgagee and the fulfilment of
	any lawful condition of such consent;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	where the Landlord reasonably so requires either the delivery to the Landlord:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 119.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.2PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	of a Deed of Guarantee entered into by one or more guarantors reasonably acceptable to the Landlord;
	or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 119.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.2PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	of a rent deposit deed entered into by the proposed assignee in such form as the Landlord may from
	time to time reasonably require together with payment to the Landlord by way of cleared funds of such sum as is reasonably required
	by the Landlord and specified in the rent deposit deed; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	on an assignment by the Tenant to a company which is another member of the same group of companies,
	the ultimate holding company (unless it is the assignee, or it would itself be giving an authorised guarantee agreement), enters
	into a Deed of Guarantee but if the ultimate holding company would otherwise be released from liability, the Landlord may require
	another substantial member of the group to give the guarantee.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.18.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Charging
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not without the Landlord&rsquo;s
	prior written consent (which shall not be unreasonably withheld) to mortgage or charge the Premises as a whole or to allow any
	person deriving title from the Tenant to mortgage or charge the Premises as a whole.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.19
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Sharing with a Group Company
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Nothing
	in Clause&nbsp;3.18&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Alienation
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;) shall restrict
	the right of the Tenant to allow any Group Company of the Tenant to occupy or share the occupation of the Premises from time to
	time provided that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -35.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.4PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	no relationship of Landlord and Tenant shall be created or deemed to exist between the Group Company
	and the Tenant;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -35.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.4PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Group Company shall not be permitted to have exclusive occupation of the whole or any part
	or parts of the Premises; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -35.4PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 35.4PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the relevant company shall vacate the Premises forthwith upon ceasing to be a Group Company.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.20
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Registration
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Within one month after the
	execution of any assignment, charge, transfer or underlease or upon any transmission by reason of a death or otherwise affecting
	the Premises or any part of them to produce to and leave with the solicitors for the time being of each of the Landlord and Superior
	Landlord a certified copy of the deed, instrument or other document evidencing or effecting such transmission and on each occasion
	to pay to such solicitors their proper registration fee and in addition either to pay or to reimburse the Landlord for the registration
	fee of the Superior Landlord and/or its solicitor.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.21
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Encroachments and third party rights
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.21.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to stop up, darken or obstruct any windows or lights belonging to the Premises or permit any
	encroachment or easement to be made or acquired in relation to the Premises which may cause damage, annoyance or inconvenience
	to the Landlord the Superior Landlord the Head Landlord or any of its tenants and if any such window, light, opening, doorway,
	path, passage, drain or other encroachment or easement shall be made or acquired to permit the Landlord&rsquo;s Surveyor, servants
	and agents to enter the Premises at reasonable times (accompanied by a representative of the Tenant save in case of emergency or
	where the Tenant fails to provide such a representative after reasonable prior notice from the Landlord) to ascertain the nature
	of such encroachment or easement and at the request of the Landlord to adopt at the cost of the Landlord such means as may be reasonably
	required or deemed proper by the Landlord for preventing any such encroachment or the acquisition of any such easement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.21.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to give to any third party any acknowledgement that the Tenant enjoys the access or light to
	any of the windows or openings in the Premises by the consent of such third party nor to pay to such third party any sum of money
	nor to enter into any agreement with such third party for the purpose of inducing or binding such third party to abstain from obstructing
	the access of light to any of such windows or openings and in the event of any of the owners of adjacent land or buildings doing
	or threatening to do anything which obstructs the access of light to any of the windows or openings in the Premises to notify the
	same immediately to the Landlord.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.22
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Nuisance
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to do any act, deed or
	thing in or about or in connection with the Premises (including without limitation the Roof Terrace) which may be or become a nuisance
	or which may be or lead to the damage, annoyance, inconvenience or disturbance of the Landlord or the owners, tenants or occupiers
	of any premises on the Estate or be injurious to the value, tone, amenity or character of the Building or the Estate.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 20; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
