<A NAME="eolPage153"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.23
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Hazardous goods
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to keep or deposit for
	sale or otherwise in or on the Premises any goods of a dangerous, hazardous or especially combustible nature except under conditions
	of storage and use strictly in accordance with the requirements whether statutory or otherwise of the fire or other appropriate
	authorities and of the Landlord&rsquo;s insurers and not to keep any materials which may contravene any statute or local regulation
	or bylaw, but the storage of usual office supplies and paper transactional records in the ordinary course of business, will not
	be a breach of this provision.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.24
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Contamination
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.24.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to cause any contamination or pollution on, in or under the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.24.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to discharge any contaminative or hazardous substance from the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.25
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Compliance with statutes, etc.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.25.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To comply with all requirements of all Acts in relation to the Premises and the rights granted
	to the Tenant under this lease and do all things on or in respect of the Premises which are required by any Act and to keep indemnified
	the Landlord against all claims, demands, costs, expenses and liability in respect of them provided that the Landlord uses reasonable
	endeavours to mitigate its losses and expenses and does not settle any claim or proceedings in this respect without first consulting
	with the Tenant.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.25.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To comply with all requirements and regulations of the relevant supply authority as to the electrical
	or other service or utility installations in the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.25.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In relation to any work that the Tenant carries out to or upon the Premises to which the Construction
	(Design and Management) Regulations 2007 or any modification or replacement of the same (the &ldquo;
<B>
	CDM Regulations
</B>
	&rdquo;)
	apply the Tenant shall:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	be the only client for the purposes of the CDM Regulations, in which case the Tenant warrants to
	the Landlord that it has the competence and resources to comply with those requirements;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	upon completion of such work, supply to the Landlord (without charge and subject to an irrevocable
	royalty free licence in favour of the Landlord and/or its agents to use the same for any purpose connected with the Building) a
	copy of the health and safety file relating to such work and any other information relevant to health and safety and make the health
	and safety file available for inspection as soon as reasonably practicable after a request from the Landlord; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	as soon as reasonably practicable after it becomes aware of any information relevant to health
	and safety in relation to the Premises, provide such information to the Landlord.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.26
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Planning Acts
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.26.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In relation to the Planning Acts (and without prejudice to the provisions of Clause&nbsp;3.25.1):
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	so often as occasion shall require at the expense in all respects of the Tenant to obtain from
	(as the case may be) the local planning authority or the Secretary of State for the Environment or such other authority as may
	from time to time be appropriate all consents and permissions (if any) as may be required for the carrying out of any operations
	on the Premises or the institution or continuance on the Premises of any activity which may constitute development within the meaning
	of the Planning Acts; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 21; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	17
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage154"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	not to make any application for planning permission without the previous written consent of the
	Landlord (such consent not to be unreasonably withheld).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.26.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To pay and satisfy any charge that may be imposed under the Planning Acts in respect of the carrying
	out or maintenance of the operations or the institution or continuance of any activity referred to in Clause&nbsp;3.26.1(a).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.26.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Notwithstanding any consent which may be granted by the Landlord under this Lease not to carry
	out or make any alteration or addition to the Premises or any change of use of the Premises before any requisite planning permission
	has been produced to the Landlord and acknowledged by it in writing as satisfactory to it and, subject to Clause&nbsp;3.26.4, such
	acknowledgement shall not be unreasonably withheld.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.26.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord may refuse so to express its satisfaction with any such planning permission on the
	ground that its period of validity or anything contained in or omitted from it is likely (in the reasonable opinion of the Landlord)
	to be prejudicial to the Landlord&rsquo;s interest in the Premises whether during the Term or following the Termination of the
	Term.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.26.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Unless the Landlord shall otherwise direct to carry out before the Termination of the Term any
	works stipulated to be carried out to the Premises by a date subsequent to the Termination of the Term as a condition of any planning
	permission which may have been granted to the Tenant and in respect of which implementation has been commenced during the Term.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.26.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If and when called upon so to do to produce to the Landlord all such plans, documents and other
	evidence as the Landlord may reasonably require in order to satisfy itself that the provisions of this covenant have been complied
	with in all respects.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.26.7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the Tenant shall receive any compensation with respect to its interest under this Lease because
	of any restriction placed upon the user of the Premises under or by virtue of the Planning Acts then if and when its interest under
	this Lease is determined by assignment or at the Termination of the Term (if earlier) immediately to make such provision as is
	just and equitable for the Landlord to receive its due benefit from such compensation.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.26.8
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To comply with such provisions of the Planning Permission and the Planning Agreement as are applicable
	to an occupational tenant of the Premises provided that it is acknowledged that the obligation of the Tenant to comply with the
	Planning Agreement shall not extend beyond that anticipated by clause 8.3.1(ii) of the Planning Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.27
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Notices
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.27.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To give full particulars (including copies where and when available) to the Landlord within seven
	days of receipt of any permission, notice, order or proposal for a notice or order relating to the Premises made given or issued
	to the Tenant or left at the Premises by any government department, local, public or other competent authority and if so required
	by the Landlord to produce such permission, notice, order or proposal for a notice or order to the Landlord.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 22; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	18
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage155"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.27.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Without delay to take all reasonable but commercially prudent or necessary steps to comply in all
	respects with any such notice or order so far as it relates to the Premises and also at the request of the Landlord to make or
	join with the Landlord, at the Landlord&rsquo;s cost, in making such objections or representations against or in respect of any
	such notice, order or proposal as the Landlord shall consider expedient save where such representations would materially adversely
	affect the Tenant&rsquo;s use and occupation of the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.28
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Landlord&rsquo;s regulations
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To comply with the Building
	Regulations, the Accessway Regulations and any reasonable regulations relating to the Estate Common Parts made by the Superior
	Landlord and notified to the Tenant in writing from time to time.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.29
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Signs
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.29.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not without the prior consent of the Landlord to affix to or exhibit on any part of the Premises
	any placard, poster, signboard, nameplate, flag, mechanical, neon or electric sign or advertisement of any description which is
	visible from the exterior of the Building save that the Tenant may erect a sign identifying the Tenant and its business on the
	tenants' nameboard on the 6
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	floor with the Landlord&rsquo;s consent, not to be unreasonably withheld or delayed.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.29.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Tenant may, subject to the Superior Landlord&rsquo;s consent, not to be unreasonably withheld
	or delayed, erect a sign identifying the Tenant and its business within the main reception area of the Building
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	and
	the Landlord will at the Tenant&rsquo;s cost use its reasonable endeavours to procure the Superior Landlord&rsquo;s consent.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.29.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any sign exhibited or erected pursuant to 3.29.1 and 3.29.2 above, must be
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	of
	a reasonable size and have (if necessary) been approved pursuant to the Planning Acts.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.30
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	EPCs
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.30.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to obtain an EPC for the Premises or the Building without the consent of the Landlord and Superior
	Landlord (not to be unreasonably withheld where an EPC is required by statute).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.30.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	It shall be reasonable for the Landlord and the Superior Landlord to withhold consent pursuant
	to Clause&nbsp;3.30.1 if:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any Existing EPC remains valid;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Landlord and/or Superior Landlord provide to the Tenant a valid EPC for the Premises; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Landlord and/or Superior Landlord agree (at the Tenant&rsquo;s cost) to obtain an EPC for the
	Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.30.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the Tenant requests (and the Landlord and Superior Landlord provide) any information required
	in order to allow an energy assessor to prepare an EPC then the Tenant shall on demand pay to the Landlord and Superior Landlord
	the Landlord&rsquo;s and Superior Landlord&rsquo;s reasonable costs and expenses properly incurred in providing such information.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.30.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the Tenant obtains an EPC in breach of Clause&nbsp;3.30.1, not to provide a copy of such EPC
	to the Landlord and Superior Landlord so as not to invalidate any EPC that the Landlord or Superior Landlord may already possess.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 23; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	19
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage156"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.30.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Where necessary, to allow the Landlord and Superior Landlord and their employees or its agents
	to have access to all documentation, data and information in the Tenant&rsquo;s possession or under its control reasonably required
	by the Landlord or Superior Landlord to enable it to:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 114.85PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 78PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	prepare an EPC and Recommendation Report for the Building; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 114.85PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 78PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	comply with any duty imposed on the Landlord under the EPC.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.31
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Reletting and for sale boards
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.31.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	For the period of six months immediately preceding the Termination of the Term or at any time in
	the case of a proposed sale of the Landlord&rsquo;s and/or Superior Landlord&rsquo;s interest in the Lease and subject to there
	being no substantial interference with the Tenant&rsquo;s enjoyment of the Premises or its rights of access and of light and air
	to the Premises to permit a sale or letting board to be exhibited on some conspicuous part of the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.31.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To permit an inspection by any prospective purchaser or tenant (accompanied by a representative
	of the Tenant save where the Tenant fails to provide such a representative after reasonable prior notice) at any reasonable time
	in the day and upon reasonable notice in writing of not less than 24 hours having been given.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.32
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Use of Common Parts
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.32.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to do or omit to do any act whereby any of the Common Parts or the Estate Common Parts may
	be damaged or obstructed or whereby the fair use of the Common Parts or by the Estate Common Parts by others may be impeded or
	obstructed in any manner.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3.32.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To make good immediately any damage done to the Common Parts or the Estate Common Parts by the
	Tenant or any employee or invitee of the Tenant and not to place or leave anything in the Common Parts or the Estate Common Parts
	or otherwise obstruct them.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.33
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Landlord&rsquo;s title
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	To
	observe and perform the covenants and provisions on the part of or binding upon the Landlord in the documents (if any) specified
	or referred to in Schedule 3&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Matters to which the Lease is subject
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;)
	so far as they relate to the Premises.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.34
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	To observe Superior Lease
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To perform and observe the
	covenants (other than payment of rent) on the part of the tenant contained in the Superior Lease insofar as they relate to the
	Premises.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	3.35
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Indemnity
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To indemnify the Landlord against
	all proper losses, damages, proceedings, actions, claims, demands, costs and expenses incurred or suffered by the Landlord whether
	before or after Termination of the Term as a result of any breach by the Tenant of any of the Tenant&rsquo;s obligations contained
	in this Lease provided that the Landlord uses reasonable endeavours to mitigate its losses and expenses and does not settle any
	claim or proceedings in this respect without first consulting with the Tenant.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The
	Landlord covenants with the Tenant as set out in this Clause&nbsp;4&nbsp;(
</FONT>

	Landlord&rsquo;s covenants
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;).

	&nbsp;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	4.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Quiet enjoyment
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Subject to the Tenant paying
	the rents reserved by and performing and observing the covenants and conditions on the part of the Tenant contained in this Lease
	the Tenant shall peaceably hold and enjoy the Premises during the Term without interruption from or by the Landlord or by any person
	lawfully claiming under or in trust for the Landlord or by title paramount.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	4.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Services
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	It will (subject as mentioned
	below) provide the Sixth Floor Services and will use all reasonable endeavours to:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	procure that the Superior Landlord provides the services mentioned in Schedule 4&nbsp;of the Superior
	Lease (
<I>
	the Building Service Charge
</I>
	);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	procure that the Superior Landlord provides hot and cold water supplies to the Premises; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	procure that the Superior Landlord procures the provision of the Estate Services and the Block
	B Services as defined in the Headlease;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	provided that the Landlord
	has no liability if the Superior Landlord decides at its reasonable discretion (acting in the interest of the proper management
	of the Building) to extend, diminish, remove or otherwise vary the services provided for the Building, so long as such variations
	do not materially adversely affect the Tenant&rsquo;s use and enjoyment of the Premises.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">

	4.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Covenants in Superior Lease
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 49.65PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To pay the
	rent reserved by the Superior Lease and to observe and perform the tenant&rsquo;s covenants in the Superior Lease (insofar as the
	same relate to the Premises and in so far as the Tenant is not liable for such observance and performance under its covenants in
	this Lease) and to use all reasonable, but commercially prudent endeavours to enforce the covenants on the part of the Superior
	Landlord contained in the Superior Lease;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	4.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Planning Agreement
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To indemnify the Tenant against
	all losses, damages, proceedings, actions, claims, demands, costs and expenses arising out of any breach of the provisions of the
	Planning Agreement and/or the Planning Permission (save to the extent that any breach is attributable to the failure of the Tenant
	to comply with Clause&nbsp;3.26.8 or to any works or change of use carried out or implemented by the Tenant).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	4.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Construction Warranties
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	4.5.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	To use all reasonable endeavours to enforce all available contractual or collateral warranties
	that the Landlord has the benefit of in relation to the design and construction of the Building or defective materials in the Building
	and to apply any compensation monies received pursuant to any such claims or enforcement in the making good of such defect in the
	design and construction of the Building or defective materials to which the relevant warranty or claim refers.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	4.5.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	All costs and expenses properly incurred by the Landlord pursuant to the obligation in Clause&nbsp;4.5.1
	(to the extent not actually recovered from the relevant warrantor pursuant to any claim) shall be recoverable as an item of service
	charge under Schedule 4&nbsp;(
<I>
	Sixth Floor
</I>
<I>
	Service charge
</I>
	)
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">

	&nbsp;

</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Insurance
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	5.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Landlord&rsquo;s obligations
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord will use all reasonable,
	but commercially prudent endeavours to procure that the Superior Landlord complies with the covenants imposed on it regarding insurance
	contained in the Superior Lease save to the extent that the policy of insurance has been vitiated or any insurance proceeds withheld
	in consequence of any act or omission of the Tenant or its workers, contractors or agents or any person on the Premises with the
	actual or implied authority of any of them. Neither the Superior Landlord nor the Landlord shall be obliged to insure any part
	of the Premises installed by the Tenant.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	5.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Tenant&rsquo;s obligations
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Tenant will:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	not do anything which may prejudice or invalidate any policy of insurance effected or procured
	for the Building or increase the premium for such policy and on demand to pay to the Landlord a sum equivalent to any insurance
	proceeds which are withheld by any insurer as a result of any act or default on the part of the Tenant;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	without prejudice to the rights of the Landlord in respect of any breach of Clause&nbsp;5.2(a)
	pay to the Landlord within ten (10) Working Days of written demand all sums paid by way of increased premium and all expenses incurred
	by it in the renewal of any such policy or policies rendered necessary by a breach of that covenant;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	not do anything on the Premises or in the Building which might in the reasonable opinion of the
	Landlord increase the risk of fire or other damage occurring to the Premises or to the Building or to any nearby buildings or materials;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	notify the Landlord immediately in writing of damage to the Premises by any Insured Risk or Uninsured
	Risk;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	comply with all requirements and recommendations in respect of the Premises from time to time of
	any insurer of the Building which are notified to the Tenant in writing and the appropriate fire authority;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(f)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	supply and maintain in good condition at all times such fire fighting equipment as shall be required
	by the Fire Officer or other appropriate official for the district for the time being and to comply with all regulations imposed
	in respect of the Premises;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(g)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	within ten Working Days of demand pay to the Landlord a fair proportion as certified by the Landlord&rsquo;s
	Surveyor of any insurance excess or deduction imposed or made by any insurer of the Building in respect of any claim made; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(h)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	not to insure the Premises against any of the Insured Risks.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	5.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Rent suspension
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	5.3.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the Building or any part of it shall at any time be destroyed or damaged by an Insured Risk
	so as to render the Premises unfit for occupation or use or inaccessible, then (unless and to the extent that the insurance has
	been vitiated by reason of the act or default of the Tenant or any person deriving title under the Tenant or any of their respective
	agents, employees or licensees) the Principal Rent and the Sixth Floor Service Charge, Building Service Charge, Estate Service
	Charge and Block Service Charge or a fair proportion (according to the nature and extent of the damage sustained) shall cease to
	be payable until the earlier of:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 26; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	22
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage159"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Premises are again rendered fit for occupation or use (excluding fitting out and replacement
	of contents) and made accessible; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(if earlier) the expiry of five years from the date of damage or destruction.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	provided
	that any dispute to the amount of cesser of the Principal Rent and Building Service Charge, Estate Service Charge and Block Service
	Charge shall be referred to the decision of a single arbitrator under the Arbitration Act 1996 at the request of the Landlord or
	the Tenant.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	5.3.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the Principal Rent is suspended in accordance with Clause 5.4.1 before the Rent Commencement
	Date the number of days of such suspension during the period from and including the date of damage or destruction to but excluding
	the Rent Commencement Date shall be added to the date from which the Principal Rent would otherwise be payable pursuant to Clause&nbsp;5.3.1(a)
	or Clause&nbsp;5.3.1(b) and the Principal Rent shall cease to be payable until this date.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	5.3.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the obligation to make payments of the Principal Rent and Building Service Charge, Estate Service
	Charge and Block Service Charge are suspended under Clause&nbsp;5.3.1 then the Landlord will reimburse to the Tenant within 20
	Working Days of such damage or destruction the due proportion of payments of the Principal Rent and Building Service Charge, Estate
	Service Charge and Block Service Charge in advance in respect of the period on and from the date of such damage or destruction
	to the end of the relevant payment period.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	5.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Options to terminate following damage by an Insured Risk
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	5.4.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the Premises or the Building are destroyed or damaged by an Insured Risk so as to render the
	Premises unfit for occupation or use or inaccessible, then:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	if the Superior Landlord terminates the Superior Lease in accordance with Clause 5.4.1 (a) of the
	Superior Lease then the Landlord shall immediately serve a copy of such notice on the Tenant;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	if the Landlord has not notified the Tenant that the Superior Landlord intends to commence works
	of reinstatement or rebuilding within 12 months of the date of damage or destruction then the Tenant may (but not after receiving
	such notification) terminate this Lease by giving to the Landlord notice to that effect; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	if for any reason rebuilding or reinstatement of the Building in accordance with the Superior Landlord&rsquo;s
	obligations in the Superior Lease has not been completed by the expiry of five years from the date of damage or destruction then
	either the Landlord or the Tenant may terminate this Lease by giving the other party notice to that effect.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	5.4.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If notice is given pursuant to Clause&nbsp;5.4.1, then this Lease shall terminate immediately but
	such termination shall not affect any liability which has accrued at any time before the date of termination.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	5.4.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	On the termination of this Lease under
	this Clause&nbsp;5.4&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Options to terminate following damage by an Insured Risk
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;),
	or if this Lease is otherwise terminated by the operation of the doctrine of frustration, the Tenant acknowledges that the Superior
	Landlord is entitled to retain for its exclusive benefit all proceeds of insurance under the terms of the Superior Lease.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->

<A NAME="eolPage160"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	5.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Uninsured Risks
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	5.5.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	For the purpose of this Clause&nbsp;5.5&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Uninsured
	Risks
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;):
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	these provisions shall apply from the date on which any Insured Risk becomes an Uninsured Risk
	but only in relation to the Uninsured Risk;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	references to an Insured Risk becoming an Uninsured Risk shall, without limitation, include the
	application by the Superior Landlord&rsquo;s insurers of an exclusion, condition or limitation to an Insured Risk to the extent
	to which such risk thereby is or becomes an Uninsured Risk; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Landlord shall notify the Tenant in writing as soon as reasonably practicable after an Insured
	Risk becomes an Uninsured Risk.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	5.5.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the Building or any part of it shall be damaged or destroyed by an Uninsured Risk so as to make
	the Premises unfit for occupation or use or inaccessible:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Principal Rent and the Building Service Charge, the Estate Service Charge Block Service Charge
	and Sixth Floor Service Charge (or a fair proportion according to the nature and extent of the damage sustained) will be suspended
	from and including the date of such damage or destruction until:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 119.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.2PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Premises are again made fit for occupation or use and accessible (excluding fitting out and
	replacements of contents); or (if earlier);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 119.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 82.2PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the date on which this Lease shall be terminated in accordance with Clause&nbsp;5.5.2(b) or Clause
	5.5.4; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Superior Landlord may in accordance with the terms of the Superior Lease within one year of
	the date of such damage or destruction serve notice on the Landlord confirming that it will reinstate the Premises (a &ldquo;Reinstatement
	Notice&rdquo;) so that the Premises shall (subject to the proviso to Clause&nbsp;5.5.1(a)) be fit for occupation or use or made
	accessible. The Landlord will notify the Tenant in writing if this occurs. If the Superior Landlord fails to serve a Reinstatement
	Notice (or gives written notice that it does not intend to reinstate) within one (1) year of the date of damage or destruction
	then either the Landlord or the Tenant may terminate this Lease by serving written notice to that effect on the other party.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	5.5.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	This Clause&nbsp;5.5 (
</FONT>
<I>
	Uninsured
	Risks
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;) shall not apply if and to the extent that an Insured
	Risk shall have become an Uninsured Risk owing to the act or default of the Tenant or any person deriving title under the Tenant
	or their respective agents, employees, licensees or contractors.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	5.5.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the Superior Landlord shall have served a Reinstatement Notice upon the Landlord and such reinstatement
	has not been completed by the date three years from the date of the Reinstatement Notice (&ldquo;Reinstatement Date&rdquo;) at
	any time after the Reinstatement Date then (but not following completion of such reinstatement) the Landlord or the Tenant may
	terminate this Lease by serving notice on the other stating that it terminates this Lease.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	5.5.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Service of a Reinstatement Notice shall not oblige the Landlord to procure the reinstatement of
	any alterations or additions of which the Tenant fails to notify the Landlord under Clause&nbsp;3.14.4 or to replace any tenant&rsquo;s
	fitting out or contents.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 28; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
