<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	5.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Termination notices under the Superior Lease
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	For the avoidance of doubt,
	if any notice is served by the Superior Landlord to terminate the Superior Lease following damage by Insured or Uninsured Risks,
	that notice shall also operate to terminate this Lease and the Landlord shall promptly provide a certified copy of it to the Tenant.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Disputes Under Superior Lease
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Notwithstanding the other terms
	of this Lease, if any dispute, issue, question or matter arising out of or under or relating to the Superior Lease also affects
	or relates to the provisions of this Lease, the determination of that dispute, issue, question or matter pursuant to the provisions
	of the Superior Lease is to be binding on the Tenant as well as the Landlord for the purposes both of the Superior Lease and this
	Lease provided that this provision is not to apply to the provisions for the review of rent payable under this Lease.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Provisos
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The parties agree to the provisos
	set out in this Clause&nbsp;7&nbsp;(
<I>
	Provisos
</I>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	No warranty
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord gives no warranty express or implied relating to the Premises including their suitability
	for the Tenant&rsquo;s purposes or any other purpose and the Tenant shall on taking this Lease be deemed to have satisfied itself
	in every respect in that regard.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord shall not be liable for any loss, injury or damage to any person or property by the
	state or condition or user of the Premises whether arising by accident or by reason of any negligence or other acts of the Tenant
	or of any person or persons employed by it.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Exclusion of liability
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.2.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Subject to Clause&nbsp;7.2.2 nothing contained in this Lease shall render the Landlord or the Tenant
	liable in respect of any of the covenants, conditions and provisions of this Lease if and so far only as the performance or observance
	of any such covenants, conditions and provisions shall become a contravention of or otherwise impossible or illegal under or by
	virtue of the Planning Acts or any other Act.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.2.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Term and the Principal Rent and other rents payable to the Landlord shall not be determined
	or suspended by reason only of any changes, modifications or restrictions of user of the Premises or obligations provisions or
	requirements made or imposed at any time under or by virtue of the Planning Acts or any other Act.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.2.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord shall not be liable to observe or perform any obligation on its part contained in
	this Lease (and the Tenant hereby releases the Landlord from time to time from all liability in respect of any breach or non observance
	of any such obligation) after it has ceased to be entitled to the immediate reversion expectant upon the Term.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	No further rights
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.3.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The demise comprised in this Lease shall not be deemed to include and shall not operate to convey
	or demise any ways, watercourses, sewers, drains, rights, liberties, privileges, easements, rights or advantages whatsoever in,
	through, over or upon the Building or the Estate other than any rights specifically granted in this Lease.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.3.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord the Superior Landlord and the Head Landlord shall have power at all times without
	obtaining any consent from or making any compensation to the Tenant to deal with or carry out works or permit or suffer the same
	to be carried out on any part of any land or buildings (whether or not belonging to the Landlord) or the Estate as the Landlord
	the Superior Landlord or the Head Landlord may in any such case think fit and to erect or permit or suffer to be erected on any
	part of any such adjoining or neighbouring land any buildings whatsoever, irrespective of any diminution or other adverse effect
	on the light or air or any other easement or right which may now or at any time during the Term be enjoyed by the Tenant or the
	other tenants or occupiers of the Premises or any part of them provided that the Tenant&rsquo;s access to and use and enjoyment
	of the Premises is not materially adversely affected.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Forfeiture
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Without prejudice to any other
	provisions contained in this Lease if:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the rents reserved by this Lease are unpaid for 21 days after becoming payable (in the case of
	the Principal Rent only whether formally demanded or not);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Tenant is in breach of any of its obligations in this Lease;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Tenant (being a company) enters into liquidation whether compulsory or voluntary (other than
	for the purpose of reconstruction or amalgamation not involving a realisation of assets) or a resolution is passed or a petition
	is presented for such liquidation and such petition is not discharged within 10 Working Days;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	an administrator is appointed in respect of the Tenant pursuant to the Insolvency Act 1986 or the
	Insolvent Partnerships Order or application is made for such administration or notice is given under paragraph 15 or 26 of schedule
	B1 to the Insolvency Act 1986 (as amended);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a receiver is appointed in respect of the Tenant or any assets of the Tenant;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(f)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	(where the Tenant comprises or includes one or more individuals) a bankruptcy order is made against
	any such individual or a petition is presented for such bankruptcy order and such petition is not discharged within 10 Working
	Days;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(g)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Tenant becomes insolvent or unable to pay its debts within the meaning of section 123 of the
	Insolvency Act 1986 or makes a proposal or enters into any composition with its or his creditors or enters into a voluntary arrangement
	(within the meaning of section 1 or section 253 of the Insolvency Act 1986);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(h)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	distress, sequestration or execution is levied on the Tenant&rsquo;s goods which is not relieved
	within 10 Working Days;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any of the above events occurs in relation to any Guarantor (excluding for this purpose any person
	whose liability at the time of such event derives from an authorised guarantee agreement); or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(j)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any event analogous to any of the above events occurs in any jurisdiction other than England,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	then the Landlord may at any
	time re-enter the Premises or any part of the Premises in the name of the whole and immediately this Lease shall terminate absolutely
	but without prejudice to any rights of the Landlord in respect of any breach of any of the obligations on the Tenant&rsquo;s part
	in this Lease.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Choice of law and jurisdiction
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.5.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Lease and any non-contractual obligations arising in connection with it (and, unless provided
	otherwise, any document entered into in connection with it) shall be governed by English law.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.5.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Subject to Clause&nbsp;7.5.4 the English courts shall have exclusive jurisdiction to determine
	any dispute arising in connection with this Lease (and, unless provided otherwise, any document entered into in connection with
	it), including disputes relating to any non-contractual obligations.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.5.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Each party irrevocably waives any objection which it may now or later have to proceedings being
	brought in the English courts (on the grounds that the English courts are not a convenient forum or otherwise).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.5.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Nothing in this Lease (or, unless provided otherwise, any document entered into in connection with
	it) shall prevent a party from applying to the courts of any other country for injunctive or other interim relief.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Severability
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If any provision of this Lease
	or its application to any person or circumstance is void or unenforceable then such provision or its application to such person
	or circumstance shall be severed from this Lease so that the validity of the remainder of this Lease and the application of such
	provision to other persons or circumstances shall not be affected by such severance.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.7
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Rights of third parties
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No person other than a contracting
	party may enforce any provision of this Lease by virtue of the Contracts (Rights of Third Parties) Act 1999.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.8
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Notices
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The provisions of section 196
	of the Law of Property Act 1925 shall apply to any notice required or given under any Clause or covenant or condition in this Lease.
	Notice to the Tenant may also be effected by service to the Tenant at the Premises. Service by electronic mail shall not be valid
	for the purposes of this Lease.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.9
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Failure to provide services
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord shall not be responsible
	to the Tenant or any other person for:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any damage, loss or inconvenience caused by or resulting from any defect or failure or interruption
	in the lighting or water or electricity supply or drainage system (whether in the Premises or any other part of the Building or
	elsewhere) provided that the Landlord shall take all reasonable steps within its power to remedy such defect, failure or interruption
	within a reasonable period of notice from the Tenant specifying the defect, failure, inability or interruption in question;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	any defect in or inability to supply or
	interruption to the services referred to in Clause&nbsp;4.2&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Services
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;)
	provided that the Landlord shall take all reasonable steps within its power to remedy such defect or interruption within a reasonable
	period of notice from the Tenant specifying the defect inability to supply or interruption in question; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	anything beyond the Landlord&rsquo;s control.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.10
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Landlord&rsquo;s and Superior Landlord&rsquo;s right to alter
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord and the Superior
	Landlord may from time to time make such alterations in any part of the Building (excluding the Premises) as it shall think fit
	and (without limitation) any such alterations may be made by closing the present or then current Common Parts and substituting
	other parts of the Building as Common Parts provided that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any substituted works and things shall be substantially no less convenient for the enjoyment of
	the Premises than those for which they are substituted; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the work of substitution shall be carried out in such manner as to minimise (so far as reasonably
	practicable) any inconvenience to the Tenant.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.11
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Tenant&rsquo;s property at the end of the Term
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.11.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If at the end of the Term any furniture or effects belonging to the Tenant are left in the Premises
	or the Building for more than 10 Working Days the Landlord shall have power to sell them as agent for and on behalf of the Tenant.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.11.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord shall pay or account to the Tenant on demand for the proceeds of such sale (but not
	any interest on the proceeds) less any costs of storage and sale reasonably incurred by the Landlord and any other sums still remaining
	due to the Landlord under the terms of this Lease.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.12
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	New tenancy
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Lease constitutes a new
	tenancy as defined in the Landlord and Tenant (Covenants) Act 1995.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.13
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Superior Landlord and Head Landlord
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	7.13.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Any of the Landlord&rsquo;s rights in
	Schedule 2&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Rights reserved to the Landlord
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;)
	are exercisable by any Superior Landlord and the Head Landlord, their employees, agents and workpeople to the extent permitted
	by the Superior Lease and the Headlease.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.13.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Where the consent or approval of the Landlord is required for any act or matter the consent or
	approval of the Superior Landlord and Head Landlord is also required wherever required pursuant to the Superior Lease or the Headlease
	and the Tenant must indemnify the Landlord against the reasonable costs properly incurred of obtaining it.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7.13.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Nothing in this Lease implies any obligation upon the Superior Landlord or Head Landlord not unreasonably
	to withhold any such consent or approval, unless such obligation exists in the Superior Lease or the Headlease.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.14
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Landlord&rsquo;s warranty
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The
	Landlord warrants to the Tenant and those deriving title under it that (other than the matters referred to in Schedule 3&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Matters
	to which the Lease is subject
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;)) there are no covenants, restrictions,
	provisions or other title matters contained in the title to the Estate that would prevent, inhibit or prejudice the occupation,
	use and enjoyment by the Tenant of the Premises and the rights hereby granted in accordance with the terms of this Lease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	7.15
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Delivery
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This document shall be treated
	as having been executed and delivered as a deed only upon being dated.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	8
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
	Guarantor&rsquo;s covenant
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	8.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Guarantor hereby covenants with and guarantees to the Landlord as principal debtor that:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Tenant will pay the Principal Rent, Insurance Rent, Sixth Floor Service Charge, Building Service
	Charge, Block Service Charge and Estate Service Charge all other rents and monies payable under this Lease at the respective times
	and in the manner appointed above for payment and will fully observe and perform the covenants, agreements and stipulations on
	the part of the Tenant contained in this Lease; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	the Guarantor will pay and indemnify the
	Landlord against all proper losses and costs and expenses sustained by the Landlord as a result of any default in respect of the
	matters mentioned in this Clause&nbsp;8&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Guarantor&rsquo;s covenant
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	8.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Guarantor hereby further covenants and guarantees that the Tenant will observe and perform
	its obligations under any authorised guarantee agreement entered into by the Tenant pursuant to the terms of this Lease.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	8.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Guarantor&rsquo;s obligations and liabilities under Clause&nbsp;8.1 and
<B>
	&lrm;
</B>
	Clause&nbsp;8.2
	shall extend to any claims arising prior to any forfeiture of this Lease even if they have not been made or quantified until after
	forfeiture of this Lease.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	8.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	It is hereby agreed that the Guarantor&rsquo;s liability shall not be discharged, lessened or in
	any way affected by any neglect or forbearance of the Landlord in endeavouring to obtain payment of the Principal Rent, Sixth Floor
	Service Charge, Building Service Charge, Block Service Charge, Estate Service Charge, Insurance Rent and/or any other rents or
	sums payable under this Lease as and when the same become due or by any delay in taking steps to enforce performance or observance
	of the covenants, agreements and stipulations on the part of the Tenant or by any time, indulgence or other concession which may
	be given by the Landlord to the Tenant or (subject to section 18 Landlord and Tenant (Covenants) Act 1995) by any variation of
	the terms of this Lease or by any disclaimer of this Lease or by any other act or thing whereby (but for this Clause) the Guarantor&rsquo;s
	liability may have been discharged, lessened or otherwise affected.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	8.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Guarantor hereby further covenants with the Landlord that if this Lease is disclaimed or forfeited
	then the Landlord may within 6 months following the disclaimer or forfeiture (as the case may be) by notice in writing require
	the Guarantor to accept a new lease of the Premises in their then actual state and condition (and subject to any subsisting underlease
	or tenancy or other interest for the time being affecting the same) for a term equivalent to the residue which if there had been
	no disclaimer or forfeiture would have remained of the Term at the rents last payable under this Lease and subject to the same
	covenants agreements and stipulations provided that:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the new lease and the rights and liabilities under it are to take effect as from the date of such
	disclaimer or forfeiture (as the case may be); and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Guarantor shall pay the Landlord&rsquo;s reasonable costs (including solicitors&rsquo; charges
	and disbursements) properly incurred in the preparation and granting of such new lease and shall accept the new lease and will
	execute and deliver to the Landlord a counterpart of it.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	8.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	It is hereby agreed that if any payment is made under the terms of this guarantee and the Guarantor
	is thereupon subrogated to all the Landlord&rsquo;s rights of recovery in relation thereto then the Guarantor shall not exercise
	any such rights against the Tenant.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	8.7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	It is further agreed as follows:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	the obligations of the Guarantor shall
	take effect on the grant or (as appropriate) the assignment of this Lease to the Tenant and are to remain in force so long as and
	to the extent that the Tenant is not released by law from liability for the matters referred to in this Clause&nbsp;8&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Guarantor&rsquo;s
	covenant
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;) (but without prejudice to Clause&nbsp;8.2 and Clause&nbsp;8.3);
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	for the purposes of this Clause&nbsp;8&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Guarantor&rsquo;s
	covenant
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;) the expression &ldquo;Tenant&rdquo; shall mean the
	Tenant in relation to whom the Guarantor&rsquo;s guarantee and obligations under this Clause&nbsp;8&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Guarantor&rsquo;s
	covenant
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;) are entered into but not any lawful assignee of such
	Tenant; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	in this document, references to this Lease being disclaimed shall, for the avoidance of doubt,
	include any action which has the effect of terminating or otherwise curtailing the Tenant&rsquo;s obligations under this Lease,
	whether arising from the action of an insolvency office holder or any other person lawfully empowered to take such action or pursuant
	to any order of a court (whether in England and Wales or in any other jurisdiction).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-TRANSFORM: UPPERCASE; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	9.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	The parties confirm that:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 85.05PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -28.3PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	Tenant Act 1954, applying to the tenancy created by this lease before the Agreement to Lease was entered into; and
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Schedule
	1
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Rights granted to the Tenant
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The right at all times for the Tenant and all persons deriving title under or through the Tenant
	and their or its servants, agents and licensees (in common with the Landlord, the Superior Landlord, the Head Landlord and all
	other persons having the same right) to use the Common Parts (excluding the Roof Terrace) and the Sixth Floor Common Parts for
	access to and from the Premises and for such other purposes as may be reasonably necessary for the use and occupation of the Premises
	in accordance with this Lease provided that in the exercise of this right:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Common Parts and Sixth Floor Common Parts shall be kept clear and unobstructed at all times;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	no damage shall be caused to the Common Parts and/or the Sixth Floor Common Parts;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Common Parts and Sixth Floor Common Parts may (after reasonable notice of intention has been
	given, except in an emergency) be closed as often as may be necessary for repairs or alterations or for obtaining access to any
	services or Conduits through or under them or for any other purpose relating to the proper operation or management of the Building
	or of the Landlord&rsquo;s Premises but not (except in an emergency) in any manner as to interfere substantially with the conduct
	of the Tenant&rsquo;s business;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	if at any time during the Term and in its reasonable discretion in the interests of good estate
	management of the Building the Landlord or Superior Landlord shall desire to alter, stop up, reduce or divert any of the Sixth
	Floor Common Parts or Common Parts (as applicable) (including the Conduits under the Common Parts and Sixth Floor Common Parts)
	the Landlord and/or Superior Landlord shall have full right and liberty so to do but at its own expense (as applicable) and subject
	to the Landlord and/or Superior Landlord (as applicable) leaving available for use by the Tenant reasonable means of access to
	and from the Premises and subject also to the right of free passage and running of services referred to in paragraph&nbsp;3 applying
	to any substituted or diverted Conduits; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Tenant will at all times comply with the Accessway Regulations.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	At all times for the Tenant and all persons deriving title under or through the Tenant and/or their
	servants, agents and licensees such rights as are granted to the Landlord from time to time under the Headlease over the Estate
	Common Parts and the Block B Common Parts (as such terms are defined in the Headlease and as may be varied from time to time pursuant
	to the Headlease) to the extent such rights are necessary for the Tenant&rsquo;s use and enjoyment of the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The full, free and uninterrupted passage and running of water, soil, steam, air, oil, gas and electricity,
	telephone and all other services or supplies from and to the Premises through the Conduits in, on or under the Building (other
	than Conduits which exclusively serve other parts of the Building).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The right (subject to all rights reserved to the Landlord, the Superior Landlord and the Head Landlord
	in this Lease) to subjacent and lateral support and shelter for the Premises from other parts of the Building.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">

	the Tenant
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The rights subject to obtaining the prior written consent of the Landlord (such consent not to
	be unreasonably withheld):
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to install for the benefit of the Premises through the ducts comprised within the Conduits (to
	the extent that they have capacity) new pipes, cables or wires for the supply of any service media or information technology systems
	to or from the Premises or for the purposes of connecting the Premises with any other premises in the Building in which the Tenant
	has an interest and to make connections with any existing apparatus;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">

</P>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	to enter onto the Common Parts for the purposes of cleaning, repairing, maintaining and renewing
	Conduits which exclusively serve the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

	6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	The right to
</FONT>
	install a sign on
	the tenant&rsquo;s name board for the Building and any such tenant&rsquo;s name board as may be installed in the Sixth Floor Common
	Parts subject to obtaining the prior written consent of the Superior Landlord, such consent not to be unreasonably withheld
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The rights exercisable by this paragraph&nbsp;6 are subject to the Tenant:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	obtaining all statutory and planning approvals;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	making good all damage caused in the exercise of such rights and causing as little inconvenience
	to the other occupiers of the Building;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	indemnifying the Landlord against all claims, costs, demands, losses and expenses which the Landlord
	may suffer or incur in the exercise of such rights; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	removing all permitted works at the Termination of the Term and reinstating to the reasonable satisfaction
	of the Landlord.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	8
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The right to use the loading bay provided from time to time by the Landlord and/or the Superior
	Landlord and/or the Head Landlord for the purpose of deliveries to and collections from the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	9
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The right to use the refuse storage/collection facilities within the Building for the purposes
	of refuse disposal only.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	10
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The right to use the showers in the basement of the Building in common with the other tenants of
	the Building.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	11
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The right to use the Roof Terrace during such periods as the Landlord may in writing notify the
	Tenant from time to time subject to complying with the Landlord&rsquo;s and Superior Landlord&rsquo;s reasonable rules and regulations
	as to use of the Roof Terrace save that the Landlord and/or Superior Landlord may close the Roof Terrace for such periods as they
	see fit for the purposes of cleaning and maintaining the Roof Terrace and for any private events the Landlord, Superior Landlord
	or those authorised by them wish to hold on the Roof Terrace.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 177.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 177.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	Schedule
	2 : Rights reserved to the Landlord
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Schedule
	2
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Rights reserved to the Landlord
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In favour of the Landlord any Superior
	Landlord and their lessees, tenants and licensees and all other persons authorised by or who are granted similar rights by the
	Landlord:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	All subsisting easements and quasi-easements, rights and other privileges including (but without
	limitation) the full, free and uninterrupted passage and running of water and soil, gas, oil, electricity, telephone and all other
	services and supplies of whatever nature to and from other parts of the Building through the Conduits which are at any time in,
	on, over or under the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The full and free right and liberty to enter (after giving not less than 24 hours&rsquo; prior
	notice, except in an emergency when no notice need be given) upon the Premises at all reasonable times for all or any of the following
	purposes:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	carrying out the services described in
	Schedule 4&nbsp;&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	The Sixth Floor Service Charge
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;)
	and for the Building Services as defined in the Superior Lease and for the Block B Services and the Estate Services as defined
	in the Headlease;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	connecting, laying, inspecting, repairing, cleansing, maintaining, amending, altering, replacing,
	relaying or renewing any Conduit;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	erecting, constructing or laying in, under, over or across the Premises any Conduit or any poles,
	structures, fixtures or other works for the drainage of or for the supply of water, gas, electricity, telephone, heating, steam
	and other services to other parts of the Building;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	inspecting, repairing, maintaining, renewing or decorating any other parts of the Building;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	exercising the rights of entry reserved under the terms of this Lease and/or the Superior Lease
	and/or the Headlease;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(f)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	in order to build on or into any boundary or party walls of the Premises or the Building;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(g)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	for any other reasonable purpose connected with the management of and/or the carrying out of works
	in connection with the Building and/or the Estate;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(h)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	doing anything the Landlord and/or the Superior Landlord and/or the Head Landlord reasonably considers
	desirable for the performance of its covenants in this Lease the Superior Lease or the Headlease or to third parties; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	for any other reasonable purpose,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	provided that the person or
	persons exercising such right shall do so accompanied by a representative of the Tenant (except in case of emergency or where the
	Tenant fails to provide such a representative after reasonable prior notice from the Landlord) and shall cause as little inconvenience
	as reasonably possible and make good in a reasonable manner all damage to the Premises caused in the exercise of such right.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
