<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 177.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL">
	Schedule
	2 : Rights reserved to the Landlord
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The full right and liberty to build, rebuild, redevelop or execute alterations, decoration, repairs
	and other works upon or to any other part of the Building or any Adjoining Premises in such manner as the Landlord the Superior
	Landlord or the Head Landlord or the person or persons exercising such right may think fit irrespective of any diminution or other
	adverse effect on the light or air which may now or at any time during the Term be enjoyed by the Tenant or the other tenants or
	occupiers of the Premises or any part of them and whether or not the same may temporarily interfere with the use or occupation
	of the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The right at any time to open or authorise the opening of windows in any adjoining or neighbouring
	premises overlooking the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	In connection with the exercise of any
	of the rights in this Schedule 2&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Rights reserved to the Landlord
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;)
	to erect and use scaffolding upon the outside of the Premises or the Building provided that any such scaffolding that is positioned
	outside of the Premises itself shall at all times be secured and alarmed against intruders and shall be removed from the Buildings
	as soon as reasonably possible.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The full and free right of support, shelter and protection and all other easements and rights at
	any time belonging to or enjoyed by other parts of the Building or any Adjoining Premises and the right to deal as the Landlord
	or the Superior Landlord and the Head Landlord thinks fit with all rights of light and air and drainage and covenants of which
	the Building has the benefit.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	All rights of light and air and drainage and all other easements and rights now or at any time
	belonging to or enjoyed by the Premises from or over other parts of the Building or any Adjoining Premises and the right to deal
	as the Landlord thinks fit with all rights of light and air and drainage and covenants of which the Building has the benefit.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	8
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The right (in case of fire or other emergency only) to pass through the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	9
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Full right and liberty in the event of an emergency (and the Landlord shall be the sole arbiter
	as to whether an emergency has arisen and as to its duration) to require the Tenant to remove any vehicle belonging to it or which
	is under its control from the Premises, the Common Parts, or any other part of the Estate in such manner as the Landlord the Superior
	Landlord the Head Landlord or its agents shall direct.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	10

	companies and other utility companies and/or the owners or occupiers of any transformer chamber or similar facility in the Building
	and their respective servants, agents and workmen to have access to the Premises at all reasonable times and (except in an emergency)
	upon giving reasonable notice with or without any necessary materials, appliances and equipment in connection with the management
	and maintenance of the Building, and/or of such transformer chamber or similar facility.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Schedule 4 : The Sixth Floor Service Charge
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Schedule
	4
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	The Sixth Floor Service Charge
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Sixth Floor Service Charge shall be a fair and reasonable proportion properly attributable
	to the Premises of the cost to the Landlord of the following (such proportion (which if appropriate may be the whole) to be determined
	by the Landlord&rsquo;s Surveyor (acting fairly and reasonably) but whose decision save in the case of manifest error or injustice
	shall be final):
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	keeping the Sixth Floor Common Parts and the carpets and other fixtures and fittings in them clean
	and in good and substantial repair and decorative order and (where appropriate) lit (which shall include when reasonably necessary
	the cost of renewal and replacement);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	providing, operating, repairing, maintaining, cleansing and decorating and renewing:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>

	Floor or which is used in common by the Tenant and at least one other occupier of the Sixth Floor;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</P>

	heating, ventilation, hot and cold water systems, Conduits, electricity generating equipment, lifts, plant and lighting equipment
	serving the Sixth Floor Common Parts but which do not form part of the Building Service Charge (including the cost of periodical
	inspection and all maintenance contracts); and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	firm of surveyors or other third party;

	Schedule 4 : The Sixth Floor Service Charge

</P>

</TD>

	costs for which are, notwithstanding the remainder of this Schedule 4, payable by the Tenant on demand upon the issue of such passes
	and cards);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">

</P>

</TD>

	Floor Common Parts;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</TD>

	Parts;
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

</TD>

	(h)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	providing such further services, plant, machinery, equipment or facilities as may be required by
	(or the cost of otherwise complying with) any statute, order, regulation or direction for the time being in force affecting the
	Sixth Floor Common Parts or the use or occupation of them, or the requirements of all competent authorities and of the insurers,
	or any statutory notice served in relation to the Sixth Floor Common Parts;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	making such representations against or otherwise contesting in such manner as the Landlord in its
	reasonable discretion considers appropriate the incidence of any Act relating to the whole or any part of the Landlord&rsquo;s
	Premises;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(j)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	where the Landlord (acting fairly and reasonably) considers the same to be appropriate, providing
	a contingency fund in each year of a reasonable sum to cover the prospective and contingent costs of carrying out the repair, renewal,
	decoration, cleansing, replacement and other matters mentioned in this Schedule 4 with a view to procuring that the Sixth Floor
	Service Charge shall be progressive rather than irregular and that tenants for the time being of the Landlord&rsquo;s Premises
	shall bear a proper share of accumulating liabilities;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(k)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the costs and fees of obtaining an EPC for the Landlord&rsquo;s Premises or any part of the Landlord&rsquo;s
	Premises except that the Landlord will only obtain such an EPC as is required by law;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(l)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	such further services and equipment serving the Sixth Floor Common Parts as the Landlord may in
	its reasonable discretion and in accordance with the principles of good estate management determine;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(m)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	all VAT which may be applicable to any of the foregoing services or items; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(n)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	all costs properly incurred pursuant to Clause&nbsp;4.5
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	in each case only insofar as
	each cost is not included within the Building Service Charge, Block Service Charge or Estate Service Charge.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Sixth Floor Service Charge shall be paid each year on a provisional basis by quarterly instalments
	in advance on the usual quarter days according to a proper and reasonable estimate made by the Landlord and delivered to the Tenant
	(so far as reasonably practicable not less than one month prior to the start of each Service Charge Period) of the likely the Sixth
	Floor Service Charge for the current Service Charge Period but shall be subject to adjustment under paragraph&nbsp;4.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The first payment of the Sixth Floor Service Charge in respect of the period from the date of this
	Lease until the day before the next following quarter day (both dates inclusive) is to be paid on or before the date of this Lease.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage175"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Schedule 4 : The Sixth Floor Service Charge
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord shall as soon as reasonably practicable and not later than six months after the end
	of each Service Charge Period submit to the Tenant a statement giving full details of the Sixth Floor Service Charge for the immediately
	preceding Service Charge Period. If the Sixth Floor Service Charge payable by the Tenant shall be more or less than the total of
	the provisional instalments (or the grossed-up yearly equivalent of such payments if made for any period of less than one year)
	actually paid during the immediately preceding Service Charge Period, then any sum due to or payable by the Landlord by way of
	adjustment in respect of the Sixth Floor Service Charge shall be paid or allowed as the case may be by means of a single payment
	with a reduction from the payment by the Tenant of the Sixth Floor Service Charge instalment on the quarter day next following
	the date of the submission of the statement provided that at the Termination of the Term:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the provisions of this paragraph&nbsp;4 shall continue to apply in respect of any Sixth Floor Service
	Charge relating to any period down to the Termination of the Term; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any net overpayment by the Tenant shall be reimbursed to the Tenant by the Landlord within 10 Working
	Days of its ascertainment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Sixth Floor Service Charge is to be treated as accruing on a day to day basis in order to ascertain
	yearly rates and for the purposes of apportionment in relation to any periods other than of one year.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the Landlord shall during any Service Charge Period deem it necessary or desirable to incur
	unforeseen or exceptional expenditure which forms part of the Sixth Floor Service Charge but was not provided for in the Landlord&rsquo;s
	estimate for the current Service Charge Period and which exceeds the contingency sum in paragraph 1(n) above the Landlord shall
	be entitled to recover from the Tenant the portion of the Sixth Floor Service Charge representing the whole of that expenditure
	with the collection of the next Sixth Floor Service Charge instalment on the quarter day next following the date of such expenditure.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If funds collected by way of advance payments of Sixth Floor Service Charge prove insufficient
	to meet an immediate liability (and there is no reserve fund available for the purpose), then the Landlord may borrow money for
	the purpose from reputable banks at commercially competitive rates of interest, and such interest shall be recoverable as an item
	of the Sixth Floor Service Charge
<FONT STYLE="COLOR: RED">
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	8
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In no event shall the Sixth Floor Service Charge payable by the Tenant be increased or altered
	by reason only that any part of the Landlord&rsquo;s Premises intended for letting remains unlet during the relevant Service Charge
	Period or the tenants of such areas do not comply with their obligations in relation to payment of Service Charge.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	9
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any dispute between the Landlord and the Tenant as to the amount of the final Sixth Floor Service
	Charge for any Service Charge Period shall be referred to an expert for determination in accordance with paragraph&nbsp;12 but
	the Tenant shall not be entitled to object to the Sixth Floor Service Charge or any item comprised in it on any of the following
	grounds:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the inclusion in a subsequent Service Charge Period of any item of expenditure or liability omitted
	from the Sixth Floor Service Charge for any period preceding Service Charge Period;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	an item of Sixth Floor Service Charge included at a proper cost might have been provided or performed
	at a lower cost; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 43; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<A NAME="eolPage176"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Schedule 4 : The Sixth Floor Service Charge
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	disagreement with any estimate of future expenditure for which the Landlord requires to make provision,
	or the manner in which the Landlord exercises its discretion in providing services, so long as the Landlord has acted reasonably
	and in good faith and in accordance with the principles of good estate management.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	10
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	There shall be credited to the Sixth Floor Service Charge all sums received in respect of Sixth
	Floor Service Charge by the Landlord in respect of any policy of insurance maintained by the Landlord.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	11
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	There shall be excluded from the items comprising the Sixth Floor Service Charge:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	all costs (including professional fees of whatsoever description) incurred by or on behalf of the
	Landlord or any Superior Landlord in connection with the original construction of and equipping and fitting out of the Landlord&rsquo;s
	Premises or any parts thereof or the original installation of anything within it including all sums payable or expenditure incurred
	or to be incurred pursuant to the Planning Agreement; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any costs or liabilities attributable to the advertising marketing or letting of the Landlord&rsquo;s
	Premises .
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	12
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Any dispute referred to in paragraph&nbsp;9 shall be determined by an independent person who has
	been professionally qualified in respect of the subject matter of the dispute or difference for not less than ten years and who
	is a specialist in relation to such subject matter and such independent person shall be referred to in this paragraph as the &ldquo;
<B>
	Expert
</B>
	&rdquo;.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Expert shall be agreed
	between the parties or failing such agreement be nominated by the president or vice-president or other duly authorised officer
	of the Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors on the application of either party at any time and the following provisions shall
	apply to his appointment:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Expert shall act as expert and not as an arbitrator and his decision shall be final and binding
	upon the parties hereto;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Expert shall consider (
<I>
	inter alia
</I>
	) any written representations on behalf of any party
	(if made within 10 Working Days of receipt of notification of the appointment of the Expert) and counter-representations with such
	timescale as the Expert shall reasonably specify but shall not be bound thereby;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the parties shall use all reasonable endeavours to procure that the Expert gives his decision as
	speedily as possible but in any event within 20 Working Days of his appointment;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the costs of appointing the Expert and his costs and disbursements in connection with his duties
	under this Agreement shall be shared between the parties in such proportions as the Expert shall determine or in the absence of
	such determination equally between them; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	if the Expert becomes unable or unwilling to act then the procedure hereinbefore contained for
	appointment of an Expert shall be repeated as often as necessary.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	13
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord shall not be entitled to include within the Sixth Floor Service Charge any costs which
	the Landlord incurs in reinstating any damage or destruction caused by an Uninsured Risk save to the extent that:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	such damage or destruction does not make the whole or any part of the Premises or the Building
	unfit for occupation or use or inaccessible; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Insured Risk shall have become an Uninsured Risk owing to the act or default of the Tenant
	of any person deriving title under the Tenant or their respective agents, employees, licensees or contractors.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Schedule 5 : Building Regulations and Accessway
	Regulations
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 177.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Schedule
	5
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Building Regulations and Accessway
	Regulations
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Part 1
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Building Regulations
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Loading, unloading delivery and dispatch of goods is to be carried out only in the areas and by
	means of the entrances reasonably designated for such purposes and at the time reasonably stipulated by the Landlord.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No unnecessary obstruction shall be caused in any part of the Common Parts.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Refuse is to be properly packaged and placed in the refuse containers provided by the Landlord.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No sound amplification equipment shall be used in a manner which is audible outside the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	No property of the Tenant shall be left or stored outside the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to Smoke in the Premises or the Building.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	Part 2
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Accessway Regulations
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to deposit or permit to be deposited any waste, rubbish or refuse on the Accessway.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to obstruct any part of the Accessway.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to use the Accessway for loading, unloading delivery or dispatch of goods.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Not to ride bicycles on the Accessway.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 46; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->

	&nbsp;

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 177.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Schedule 6 : Review of Principal Rent
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 177.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Schedule
	6
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	Review of Principal Rent
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: BOLD 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	In this Schedule 6&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Review
	of Principal Rent
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;):
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	open
	market rent
</B>
	&rdquo; means the amount agreed between the Landlord and the Tenant or determined by the arbitrator as being the
	yearly rent at which the Premises could reasonably be let as a whole:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	with vacant possession;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	at the relevant Review Date;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	by a willing landlord to a willing tenant in the open market;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	without either party taking a fine or premium;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	on the basis that the willing tenant has received as a term of the letting such rent free or concessionary
	rental period or other inducement of either a capital or revenue nature as the willing landlord would negotiate with the willing
	tenant for the purposes of fitting out and the rate of the yearly rent aforesaid payable by the Tenant from the Review Date would
	be such as the willing tenant would pay at the expiry of such rent free or concessionary rent period or following the receipt of
	the inducement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(f)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	for a term of ten years commencing on the Review Date and with rent reviews at the same intervals
	as in this Lease; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(g)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	subject to and with the benefit of all other terms of this Lease apart from the amount of the rent
	payable (but including these provisions for rent review)
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	and on the
	assumption that:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(h)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Premises are fit and ready for immediate occupation and use by the willing tenant;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the provisions of this Lease have been fully complied with, save in respect of the Landlord&rsquo;s
	obligations where the Landlord has been in material and persistent breach;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(j)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	if the Premises have been damaged or destroyed they have been fully restored;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(k)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Premises can lawfully be used by the willing tenant for any of the purposes permitted by this
	Lease;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(l)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	no work has been carried out to the Premises which has diminished the rental value of the Premises;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(m)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	there is not in operation any statute, order or instrument which has the effect of regulating or
	restricting the amount of rent which might otherwise be payable but disregarding any effect on rental value attributable to any
	such matter;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(n)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the willing tenant is not in occupation of any part of the Building
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 47; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Schedule 6 : Review of Principal Rent
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	but disregarding:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(o)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any works or alterations to the Premises carried out by or on behalf of the Tenant or any permitted
	occupier of the Premises either before or after the date of this Lease with the consent of the Landlord save (in the case of improvements)
	to the extent that the same were carried out at the Landlord&rsquo;s expense or in pursuance of any obligation to the Landlord
	whether under the provisions of this Lease or otherwise;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(p)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any tenant&rsquo;s fixtures and fittings in the Premises;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(q)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any goodwill attaching to the Premises by reason of the business carried on there by the Tenant
	or any permitted occupier; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(r)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the previous occupation of the Premises by the Tenant or any permitted occupier.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	Review
	Date
</B>
	&rdquo; means the Review Date specified as such in Clause&nbsp;1.1
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord and the Tenant are to endeavour to agree the market rent at any time not being earlier
	than 12 months before the Review Date, but if they have not agreed the market rent three months before the Review Date the amount
	of the market rent shall at the request of either the Landlord or the Tenant be determined an arbitrator.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The arbitrator shall be nominated by the Landlord and the Tenant jointly but in default of agreement
	between the Landlord and the Tenant by the president for the time being of the Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors on the
	application of either the Landlord or the Tenant.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The reference to and award of the arbitrator shall be governed by the Arbitration Act 1996.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The arbitrator nominated is to be an independent surveyor being a partner in or a director of a
	leading London firm or company of chartered surveyors who is experienced in the rental valuation of office premises in London.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the arbitrator shall die or be unable or unwilling to accept his appointment or to carry out
	his functions then either the Landlord or the Tenant may apply for a replacement to be appointed in his stead, and this procedure
	may be repeated as often as necessary.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	7
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	Time is not of the essence in relation
	to any matter contained in this Schedule 6&nbsp;(
</FONT>
<I>
	Review of Principal Rent
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF">
	&nbsp;).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	8
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	From and including the Review Date the Principal Rent shall be whichever is the higher of:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Principal Rent which was reserved immediately before the relevant Review Date (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Old
	Rent
</B>
	&rdquo;); and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 82.2PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -32.55PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 49.65PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 32.55PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the open market rent of the Premises as at the relevant Review Date (the &ldquo;
<B>
	Revised Rent
</B>
	&rdquo;).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	9
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	If the Revised Rent has not been ascertained by the relevant Review Date, then the Old Rent shall
	be payable until such time as the Revised Rent has been ascertained.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 48; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	44
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage181"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Schedule 6 : Review of Principal Rent
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	10
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Once the Revised Rent has been ascertained, the Tenant shall within 10 Working Days of written
	demand pay the Landlord a sum equal to the amount (if any) by which the Revised Rent exceeds the Old Rent for the period from the
	relevant Review Date until the next quarter day following the date of such demand together with interest on each quarterly shortfall
	calculated on a daily basis from the date upon which each instalment of the shortfall would have been payable if the Revised Rent
	had then been ascertained at the rate of 4% per annum below the Prescribed Rate until 10 Working Days after the date of such demand,
	and thereafter together with interest calculated on a daily basis at the Prescribed Rate.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	11
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Landlord and the Tenant may at any time settle the Revised Rent in more than one amount and
	agree to reserve such amounts increasing in steps until the next Review Date or, if none, until the Termination of the Term, or
	as they may otherwise agree.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	12
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The parties will procure that a memorandum of the Revised Rent signed by the Landlord and Tenant
	shall be endorsed on or annexed to this Lease and its counterpart, with each party bearing its own costs in so doing.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 49; VALUE: 2 -->

	OPERATIVE
	PROVISIONS
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	In this Deed:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	Assignee
</B>
	&rdquo;
	means [
<I>
	identify the proposed assignee
</I>
	].
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	Landlord
</B>
	&rdquo;
	includes any other person or persons for the time being entitled to the reversion immediately expectant on the Term.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	Lease
</B>
	&rdquo;
	means the lease dated 22 January 2016 and made between Performing Right Society, Limited (1) Intercept Pharma Europe Limited (2)
	and Intercept Pharmaceuticals, Inc (3) in respect of premises at part 6
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	Floor 2 Pancras Square, Kings Cross London
	N1C 4AG.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	Lease
	monies
</B>
	&rdquo; means the rents and all other monies payable by the Assignee under the Lease.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN">
	&ldquo;
<B>
	Term
</B>
	&rdquo;
	means the term granted by the Lease.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	The Tenant hereby covenants with and guarantees to the Landlord as principal debtor that:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 114.85PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 78PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Assignee will pay the Lease monies at the respective times and in manner appointed for payment
	in the Lease and will fully observe and perform the covenants, agreements and stipulations contained in the Lease; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 114.85PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36.85PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 78PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36.85PT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Tenant will pay and make good to the Landlord all losses and costs and expenses sustained by
	the Landlord as a result of any default in respect of the matters mentioned in Clause&nbsp;2(a).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 45.35PT">
	3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	It is hereby agreed that the Tenant&rsquo;s liability shall not be discharged, lessened or in any
	way affected by any neglect or forbearance of the Landlord in endeavouring to obtain payment of the Lease monies as and when the
	same become due or by any delay in taking steps to enforce performance or observance of the said covenants, agreements and stipulations
	on the part of the Assignee or by any time, indulgence or other concession which may be given by the Landlord to the Assignee or
	(subject to section 18 of the Landlord and Tenant (Covenants) Act 1995) by any variation of the terms of the Lease or by any disclaimer
	of the Lease or by any other act or thing whereby (but for this Clause 3) the Tenant&rsquo;s liability may have been discharged,
	lessened or otherwise affected.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT: 10PT TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN: 0PT 0 0PT 45.35PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -45.35PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 50; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 1PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">

	46
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
	&nbsp;
